name: Velum
description:
A fast-paced action puzzle where the only solution available is to keep yourself alive as long as possible. Think fast and avoid the walls while you plan your next move in this never ending maze cave.

Available for Android 4.3 "Jelly Bean" and above.

You can make your moves using swipe gestures.

FEATURING: 

. Clear crisp minimalist and colorful graphics ;

. Unobtrusive menus, jump fast into action ;

. Highly replayable skill-based gameplay ;

. Very simple controls;

. Endless score-based gameplay challenge!
